name: csv-to-table
description: Convert a CSV/TSV/PSV file to an ASCII formatted table

commands.title: Convert to table from CSV (.csv / commas)
Convert to table from TSV (.tsv / tabs)
Convert to table from PSV (.psv / pipes)
Convert to table from SSV (.ssv / semicolon)
Convert to table from a custom defined separator

csv-to-table.openGeneratedTableInNewEdit.description: Open the generated table in a new editor window, instead of replacing the current editor's content.

csv-to-table.upperCaseHeader.description: Convert the first row's values (header) in the table to upper-case.

csv-to-table.markdownFormat.description: Write the generated table using Markdown format instead of the default style.

csv-to-table.rightAlignNumbers.description: Align cell values that are numbers to the right side for easy comparison between other row values.
